meanings.sent1: The movie was unsensational, with a simple plot and no surprises.
meanings.sent2: The book's unsensational cover didn't attract many readers.
meanings.sent3: The unsensational party had guests yawning by 9 pm.
meanings.sent4: Her speech was as unsensational as watching paint dry.
meanings.sent5: The unsensational presentation put everyone to sleep.

meanings.sent1: The news report was unsensational, just stating the facts.
meanings.sent2: The documentary was unsensational but informative.
meanings.sent3: The unsensational play had the audience laughing at its simplicity.
meanings.sent4: His unsensational life story was a lesson in humility.
meanings.sent5: The unsensational sunset painted the sky in soft hues.
